channel.title: Compiler help
channel.description:
guys, everytime i run my compiler it's telling me i dont have java when i have 6 update 20.. my server is runnning on my other pc, and i changed the ip on this pc client to the private one or else it doesnt let me log in. even though i changed it to the private one it still doesnt work... as long as i can fix my compiler i can fix that problem..
thanks

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

thanks a lot you saved me

mod lock please

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @deathschaos9 DeathsChaos9
item.description:
@deathschaos9 wrote:

[code]

@echo off
if exist “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java” (call :compile “C:\Program Files (x86)\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit[/code]

Try that.

Read full topic

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

deathschaos9:

Is jdk installed in Program Files or Program Files (x86)

its not installed in program files, but it is in program files (x86)

item.title: Compiler help
item.dc:creator: @italy544 italy544
item.description:
@italy544 wrote:

deathschaos9:

Can we see your compiler code.

yes sorry about that,

@echo off
if exist “%programfiles%\Java” (call :compile “%programfiles%\Java”) else (goto error)
:compile
for /D %%x in ("%~1jdk*") do (set p="%%~x\bin\javac.exe")
if defined p (%p% -cp . *.java)
if defined p (goto end)
:error
echo You do not have Java installed. Please download it at the site that is about to load.
“%programfiles%\Internet Explorer\iexplore.exe” http://java.sun.com/javase/downloads/index.jsp
:end
echo Finished!
pause
exit
